## internal\_\_plugin-state package

## Interfaces

| Interface                                                                      | Description                                                                                                |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [FocusableChild](./internal__plugin-state.focusablechild.md)                   | Describes a child document                                                                                 |
| [PluginProps](./internal__plugin-state.pluginprops.md)                         |                                                                                                            |
| [StateType](./internal__plugin-state.statetype.md)                             | Describes the states of a \[\[Plugin\]\]. Please note that a state type will be recreated in every render. |
| [StoreDeserializeHelpers](./internal__plugin-state.storedeserializehelpers.md) | Helpers to be used by a \[\[StateType\]\] when working with a serialized state                             |
| [StoreSerializeHelpers](./internal__plugin-state.storeserializehelpers.md)     | Helpers to be used by a \[\[StateType\]\] when working with a deserialized state                           |

## Type Aliases

| Type Alias                                                                       | Description                                                                                   |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [StateExecutor](./internal__plugin-state.stateexecutor.md)                       | Describes an asynchronous state update                                                        |
| [StateTypeReturnType](./internal__plugin-state.statetypereturntype.md)           | Maps a \[\[StateType\]\] to the type of its public API for usage in plugin components         |
| [StateTypeSerializedType](./internal__plugin-state.statetypeserializedtype.md)   | Maps a \[\[StateType\]\] to the type of its serialized state                                  |
| [StateTypesReturnType](./internal__plugin-state.statetypesreturntype.md)         |                                                                                               |
| [StateTypesSerializedType](./internal__plugin-state.statetypesserializedtype.md) |                                                                                               |
| [StateTypesValueType](./internal__plugin-state.statetypesvaluetype.md)           |                                                                                               |
| [StateTypeValueType](./internal__plugin-state.statetypevaluetype.md)             | Maps a \[\[StateType\]\] to the type of its deserialized state                                |
| [StateUpdater](./internal__plugin-state.stateupdater.md)                         | An updater will get called with the current state and helpers and should return the new state |
